message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice,  $200 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $100 at this time. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $200 is my bottom line. I know this product will be valuable to you. What do you say?
